content: Known as the 'Gunners', this football team based in London plays in the Premier League and had a notable year in 2004. Name the team.

I believe the team you're referring to is Arsenal Football Club. They are indeed known as the 'Gunners' and are based in London, playing in the Premier League. The notable year in 2004 refers to their unbeaten league campaign, where they went an entire season without losing a single game in the Premier League, a remarkable achievement in English football history.
